title: Abolish the Trade Deadline | The Island
description:
Welcome to ‘The Island’!

Each week a guest tries to persuade Nora Princiotti to agree with an argument they feel strongly about. This week’s guest is The Ringer’s Lindsay Jones, who explains her reasoning for why the NFL should get rid of the trade deadline. Will Nora join her on the island, or sail elsewhere?

Host: Nora Princiotti
Guest: Lindsay Jones
Associate Producer: Stefan Anderson
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal and Conor Nevins
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
